txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
Year 7 Trifles: This Time With Feeling II

Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.

<rgb=#FF0000>HINT: You will need to play the following instances to find some of these foes:
Ost Dunhoth
The Tower of Orthanc
The Vile Maw</rgb>
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
Draigoch still does not like you
Dúrchest would like to dance too but is very busy trying to defeat you
Make sure Saruman knows that he is Crazy
Wave to The Lieutenant of Dol Guldur
Flirt with The Mistress of Pestilence

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Durin's Bane is thinking of changing its name to [placeholder]'s Bane
Saruman does not believe such drivel
Thaurlach sees you but is in a bit of a bind
The Lieutenant of Dol Guldur was not paying attention
The Mistress of Pestilence is unmoved by your affection
